ORIGAM Documentation : DeleteFile Method

Created by Tomáš Vavrda, last modified on Nov 21, 2014

Using this method you can delete a file on a server disk drive.

PARAMETERS

Parameter
Type
Description
PathString (Context Store Reference, Data Constant Reference)A path to a file to be deleted.
